Experience Account Director Tongal July 2014  – Present (1 year 2 months) Greater New York City Area Tongal has developed a proprietary creative platform which connects brands to a global creative talent pool focused around a creative challenge. The company was founded on the understanding that creative ideas can come from anyone, anywhere. During my time as a volunteer I was the last and the first contact of the spectator in the stadium, providing help with kindness, courtesy and hospitality.  
 
It was my responsibility to welcome the spectators with joy, providing gentle and courteous guidance and showing the way to spectators from the moment they got to the stadium till they found the right way to their seats. My mission was to make the spectators stay as pleasant as possible.

Summary Matt Gillooly manages digital advertising efforts using SEM, Social, Display, Email and innovative approaches to push the limits and break marketing goals. Matt brings unique experience from innovative digital agencies and top technology start-ups like Google and Yammer. Currently, Matt works at 3Q Digital, a top digital marketing agency and loves finding innovative ways to unlock growth for his clients.  
 
Previously, Matt focused on Insurance lead generation and ecommerce at Apollo Interactive using [aod Search (AdWords/Bing Ads), Social Media, Email, and Display for clients including Einstein Noah, Wingstop, Universal Sports Network and Curves. 
 
Matt also provided marketing leadership and innovation at Yammer and Google. For instance, at Google, Matt pioneered several cutting edge customer-facing initiatives to engage and generate qualified leads throughout the pre-sales process and works in digital marketing full-time. He applies his deep passion and curiosity to research and solve interesting problems. He draws his inspiration from many fields like, advertising, economics and philosophy to name a few.  
 
Beyond the tech and advertising field, Matt also planned, marketed, and promoted high-profile events at UC Berkeley. He developed UC Berkeley's first-ever integrated social media strategy combining social, experiential and direct marketing -- partnering with Fortune 500 companies and local businesses.  
 
Outside the office, Matt enjoys backpacking and mountaineering in the Sierras and overcoming his fear of heights while rock climbing, and watching Cal Football.  
 
Graduated with a B.A. in Political Science from the University of California at Berkeley and plans to pursue an MBA.  
 
Specialties:  
• The relentless pursuit of opportunities to grow the bottom line and improve the customer's experience. 
 
• Crafting elegant solutions to complex problems in digital marketing, social media, and the B2B sales process. Utilizing Google's Enterprise tools for Business, our customers discover a better way of working by empowering their teams to connect, collaborate and get work done from anywhere on any device - simply put, by discovering a better way of working. 
 
In evaluations with customers, questions that I commonly address include: 
 
- "Is our growth potential inhibited or enabled by the technology we provide to our employees?" 
- "Where are we investing to stay ahead of competitors in an expanding playing field?" 
- "Do I have the best tools in place to mitigate the risk of losing business critical data?" 
 
The end result – your organization could be losing its competitive edge.  
 
As an Enterprise Account Manager at Google, I manage a portion of the billions of Google Apps for Business customers across North America. Driving conversations with business leaders throughout our customer base, I ensure all are leveraging the full value of Google Apps to meet business critical goals. By introducing & selling our expanded suite of Enterprise solutions - I'm simply helping the world go more Google everyday.
